level.text: Upon dissolution of the Commission, title to real and personal property of the Commission shall vest in the District. No property, assets, or earnings of the Commission shall at any time inure to any private person or entity.

The Commission may be dissolved by a vote of a majority of the Commission and approval by act of the Council; provided, that adequate provision has been made for all debts and obligations of the Commission.".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-226, see notes following ยง 1-129.01.
